t: Moreover he said{H559}{(H8799)} unto me, Son{H1121} of man{H120}, eat{H398}{(H8798)} that thou findest{H4672}{(H8799)}; eat{H398}{(H8798)} this roll{H4039}, and go{H3212}{(H8798)} speak{H1696}{(H8761)} unto the house{H1004} of Israel{H3478}.
